name: Pile Tree (GWJ version)
description:
Grow your tree, branch by branch, and see how big you can make it. But beware: if the tree is not balanced, it might fall!

The HTML  version above is experimental. If it doesn't work well for you, try the downloadable ones. HTML on Android is not recommended, try the apk instead!

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #49 - the jam had 16 days, but I made this game in only 2 (because life demanded me elsewhere).

Theme: Unstable
Wildcards (optional challenges):
- Overgrown: Have part of your game overgrown by plants
- Colossal Creature: Include a massive living thing in your game
- A Blast from the Pastel: Use a pastel color palette

This is my first attempt at including an Android build for a jam game, and also first attempting at juicing a game to look like a mobile game.

Music is from opengameart:
- https://opengameart.org/content/happy-tune
- https://opengameart.org/content/caketown-cuteplayful~
- https://opengameart.org/content/out-of-time-rpg-orchestral-essentials-danger-mus...
- https://opengameart.org/content/game-over-theme

All other assets are original
